Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory310.png'}
{3: 'The shop door swings open, ushering in a flurry of chatter.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Female Customer', 3: "Miss Ayla? Look, it's Miss Ayla!", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Male Customer', 3: 'Ayla... Could it be the Ayla who topped the "Monthly King ART"" popularity polls for ten months straight, the original creator and lead artist of ""Beautiful Angel ENDLESS"?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Female Customer', 3: "Didn't you hear? There's a signing event with Miss Ayla today! I traveled all the way from the new conservation area just to see her in person!", 4: '1'}
{2: "You're quite the sensation, huh?", 3: '14', 4: 'They\'re even calling you "Miss".', 5: '16'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Weird... I always thought my main audience was kids...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Haha, maybe you should start calling me that too, Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory748.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'To "Red Comet Masha"...? Alright, signed. Make sure to let the ink dry.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Hmmâ€”finally signed the last one. It was more tiring than I expected.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Ayla gives her wrist a shake, closes her eyes, and lets out a stretch.'}
{2: 'Some folks even tote along the whole comic collection.', 3: '26', 4: 'Seems like folks are really digging your comics, huh?', 5: '28'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "Haha, gotta admit, I was a bit surprised myself. Didn't realize I'd already published so many volumes.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "It's not that crazy. Some people just love the hype.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Oh, by the way, I\'ve got a special edition lined up for you, Commandant. Heard you\'re all hooked on the "Monthly King ART" series, right?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Definitely picking that up for some downtime reading.', 3: '33'}
{2: 'This story feels a bit different from the usual, no?', 3: '34'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "It's a special story I drew specifically for this event.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "Bringing back characters from past stories, the ones who, well, didn't make it, and those who vanished. All of them just hanging out, enjoying some carefree fun.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "A story that couldn't really happen, but I figured everyone secretly wished it could, so I made it a reality.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Even though it started as pure fan service, I actually had a blast drawing it.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "It even got me thinking... maybe I shouldn't have been so quick to bump off a certain character or two...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'With a storyteller like you, readers must be ecstatic.'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Not really, I started creating to please myself, you know?', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Ayla', 3: "But once I realized my stuff needed to be shared, I figured why make people cry over a story when I can offer them a break from their real-world troubles, even if it's just for a little while.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Beautiful Angel ENDLESS was clearly made for this very purpose.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Some "professionals" might scoff, but who cares? I don\'t.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Me neither.', 3: '54', 4: 'I really dig your comics.', 5: '54'}
{2: 'Right, a rare chance...', 3: '55'}
{2: 'Could you sign something special for me, Miss Ayla?', 3: '56'}
{3: 'You pull out the prepared comic.'}
{2: "That promise still stands, doesn't it?", 3: '61'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "Looking back, it's definitely got its cringe moments...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "The storyboard's chaotic, the dialogue rough, and the characters are more sketches than anything, lacking that comic book feel...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "No wonder it wasn't widely loved.", 4: '1'}
{2: "But I've been a fan ever since.", 3: '67'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Haha, you got it.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Consider this a special token of appreciation for my biggest fan.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She signs the comic, but with a completely different font than the one she used at the signing event.'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'This special "Ayla"" is just for the most special ""you."', 4: '1'}
